cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 2nd Jan 2026 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 2nd Jan 2026 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Basic Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: Small loft in Te Nikau Lodge. Private single room. Te Nikau Lodge is a beautiful character home providing warm hospitality amongst the Nikau Palms. From the car its a two minute walk through the rainforest to Lodge.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Nestled privately in the rainforest, with its own ensuite and tea and toast making facilities. Full Kitchen facilities in Te Ruru Lodge. Romantic Cottage. Queen bed. From the car park its a two minute walk to your accommodation

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
